channel.title: Posts on Ray Johnson's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ray Johnson's Website

item.title: Hugo
item.description: I built this new blog with Hugo. It is a fairly new tool under active development that is already powerful and shows lots of promise. More importantly it is perfect for a developer to get started without a lot of blogging experience.

item.title: Apple TV 4k
item.description: Well Apple has blessed us with a new Apple TV. But I’m still very much wanting…

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog. I built this with hugo and a bunch of other services. I’ll write more about that later. For now let’s just leave it at Hello! Ray
